name: Microsoft Recognizers Text Overview
description: Microsoft.Recognizers.Text provides recognition and resolution of numbers, units, and date/time expressed in multiple languages (CN, EN, FR, ES, and PT. Partial support for DE, JA, KO, NL). Contributions are greatly welcome! Packages are available at https://www.nuget.org/profiles/Recognizers.Text and https://www.npmjs.com/~recognizers.text
